Text: FAMEFLYNET The pregnant dancer was seen on Channel 4's The Jump in Austria last weekend supporting boyfriend Ben Cohen, but is now back in the UK, and was seen making pregnancy style look like a walk in the park. The 38-year-old wore a black-and-white printed T-shirt underneath a black blazer as she went for a stroll on the phone. With her blonde hair casually worn down in loose curls, she looked incredibly stylish in a pair of tight-fitting black leather trousers. With a pair of towering stilettos on her feet, she looked as classy as ever with a circular pendant and a giant pair of sunglasses. FAMEFLYNET.UK FAMEFLYNET.UK Kristina first announced her pregnancy in the Celebrity Big Brother house, telling her housemates: “There was something [that] happened in my life before I came into the house over Christmas. "And obviously I thought it’s very private news, you know, but because we are living as one family now and everybody is sort of supporting one another now, it happened to be that I found that my boyfriend and I are going to have a little one.” She added: "I found [out] over Christmas. Thank you guys. FAMEFLYNET.UK FAMEFLYNET.UK "I just didn’t know how to break it, what to say, when to say, it played on my mind and I wanted everyone to hear.” She did, however, have to defend the announcement when she left the compound upon her eviction. "I wanted to keep [the pregnancy] to myself at first but then I spoke to the producers and what I felt was that if I was treated differently in the house – if I was always fed [properly] and could opt out of tasks – I felt that the housemates would be very upset with me and I wanted to be fair," she explained to host Emma Willis. She has quit her role as a professional dancer on Strictly, alongside Ola Jordan and Aliona Vilani.
